mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (comment_number, post_number, comment_parent_number, comment_content, comment_writer) VALUES (#{number}, #{postNumber}, #{parentNumber}, #{content}, (SELECT user_number FROM users WHERE user_nickname = #{comment_writer}))
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM comments WHERE post_nubmer = #{postNumber} ORDER BY comment_parent_number DESC, comment_number ASC ) WHERE (#{from} <= ROWNUM AND ROWNUM <= #{to}) ORDER BY comment_parent_number ASC, comment_number ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET ( comment_content = #{content}, date_comment_modified = sysdate )
